directions: In a small saucepan, whisk together the champagne, orange juice and mustards.  Bring to a boil for approximately 5 minutes, or until the mixture is reduced.  Taste and add more mustard to suit your taste.  Remove from heat and set aside to cool.
In a large bowl, toss together the salad greens, mandarin oranges, Brie and macadamias.  Drizzle dressing on top and serve.
title: Brie and Mandarin Salad
